original_text: In Heshbon and Elealeh people cry out because of their pain. The noise reaches as far as Jahaz. It reaches from Zoar to Horonaim and Eglath-Shelishiyah. Even the Nimrim river has become dry.’ In Heshbon and Elealeh people cry out because of their pain. The noise reaches as far as Jahaz. It reaches from Zoar to Horonaim and Eglath-Shelishiyah. Even the Nimrim river has become dry.’ In Heshbon and Elealeh people cry out because of their pain.
korean_text: 헤스본에서 엘르알레를 지나 야하스까지와 소알에서 호로나임을 지나 에글랏 셀리시야에 이르는 지역에 사는 사람들이 소리를 내어 부르짖음은 니므림의 물도 황폐하였음이로다

sentences.original_text: In Heshbon and Elealeh people cry out
The noise reaches as far as Jahaz
It reaches from Zoar to Horonaim
Even the Nimrim river has become dry
